TopicTitle: I know this is pretty old, but I can't get tired of reading this.

Articles.Content:
0.21 remade the Space Center (minus R&D, and roads). This blog post details the design decisions that Bac9 (Creator of B9 Aerospace and former dev of KSP) made to make the new VAB and Spaceplane Hangar. He details how important the stockalike feel to the parts is, and I think it's a great message to plugin developers who just want to make a really cool sci-fi looking part for their plugin when a stockalike part would fit in much better.

EDIT: Here's the actual link that I forgot to add when I posted this.

Edited June 30, 2014 by GregroxMun
oops. forgot the link.
I swear I saw another post with this very recently. I thought this was the one except for the date. I'm surprised that page wasn't on the Kerbal website or the Daily Kerbal or something.

Oh yes, I remember this blog I saw it and was able to read it, it looked amazing like KSP was taking a huge leap forward and it was!! This was also the update in which it made my computer cry, because of the massive shading improvements on the inside and on the UI. I honestly totally forgot about this blog though, thanks for finding it again!!
